description: Introducing our Cold Brew smooth, bold, and refreshing. Made from premium beans, steeped for 12-24 hours for maximum flavor. Energize your senses.
Discover Hokkaido Milk Tea: A creamy delight featuring silky milk infused with caramelized sugar and black tea, offering a rich, indulgent flavor reminiscent of Japan's culinary charm.
Delight in our Brewed Tea: meticulously steeped for optimal flavor, offering a refreshing and aromatic experience with every sip. Pure enjoyment in a cup.

Discover our Strawberry Matcha Latte: a fusion of vibrant matcha green tea, creamy steamed milk, and the sweetness of strawberries. Refreshing, indulgent, and bursting with fruity flavor, it's a perfect harmony of taste and texture.
Introducing our Espresso: intense, rich, and pure. Made from finely ground coffee beans, brewed under pressure for a bold and flavorful shot.
